extendedInfo.description: GUYâS AND ST THOMASâ KIDNEY PATIENTS ASSOCIATIONAll about kidney care for people with kidney conditions. K* is a place to keep your own kidney care records, appointments, track your medicines, and keep contact with your clinicians. K* provides information and advice about kidney health care specifically for people with kidney conditions. Includes hints and tips about managing your kidney care and a top 10 kidney FAQs.This app is produced by the Guyâs and Thomasâ Kidney Patientâs Association with the involvement of patients and clinicians of the Evelina Childrenâs Hospital and Guyâs and St Thomasâ Kidney Service.Patients supporting patients.

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t have to carry a huge list of my meds. Although a few of mine were not in the app already most were. A section for more details of dialysis treatment would be good.
reviews.author: richie smith

reviews.title: So helpful
reviews.comment: This is such a great app. Very helpful
reviews.author: Grace Anslow

reviews.title: Makes life a lot easier
reviews.comment: It took a bit of time to fill in all the details but you\'ll save so much time at the clinic. I like that my details are with me in case of an emergency. No more faffing around with paperwork!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gani khan
reviews.comment: Simply notepad in a sections . But for the spirit hats off..   \"No patients are meant to die\" fight againsts kidney disease.  Gani khan.
reviews.author: A Google User
